Sentencas: A theoretical system model to study different system concepts is presented in this study.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: An SOC reactor model was developed based on the experimental analysis in pressurized SOFC and SOEC operation mode.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: An experimental analysis under pressurized conditions was performed on a commercially available Electrolyte Supported Cell (ESC) type 10 layer SOC stack.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: A simple system model analysis was performed based on this r-SOC reactor.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: The effect of different system operation parameters such as pressure, temperature, current density and utilization on system performance was analysed.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: Endothermic operation of an r-SOC stack in SOEC operation mode can lead to higher roundtrip efficiency.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: Endothermic operation in SOEC mode requires thermal energy supply.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: A thermal energy storage system to store high temperature heat released during the SOFC operation to supply heat with high exergy content for the endothermic SOEC process was investigated.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: A system roundtrip efficiency around 55%-60% is achievable with current ESC type r-SOC technology whereas the theoretical limit of roundtrip efficiency for an ideal reactor (no ohmic, activation and diffusion losses) is around 98% for the same operating conditions..
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage

Sentencas: Endothermic operation is beneficial and a heat storage concept is an attractive approach for a prototype system.
Titulo: Theoretical and experimental study of Reversible Solid Oxide Cell (r-SOC) systems for energy storage
